desc: Multiplies Item drop rate by 2 after Raid Quest is cleared when activated from map
lore: An extremely rare orange coffer found recently within the Vortex. This box made of special materials contains a magical light from another world that when unleashed in battle greatly raises the probability of obtaining rare and valuable items. Some scholars speculate that the magical light this coffer releases is actually knowledge from another world that is passed on to whomever activates the item.
name: Fortune Coffer
